artist: Artist: Pat Hui; Author: Nalan Singde
creditline: Gift of funds from Virginia Kremen in memory of Dr. Arnold Kremen

description: two images with Chinese text on small left image and English translation at right; horizontal bands of color with spots and white--green, blue and red

medium: Watercolor and metallic ink pen on paper
title: Again reaching where the green willow is picked, from a set of 24 poems
